questions.label: Identifying Information
Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى إكمال هذا القسم قبل بدء المقابلة مع المشترك.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

questions.label: ESO ID
GPS coordinate
City
District
Neighborhood
How was this person identified?

translations.ara: المستفيدين من برامج لجنة الإغاثة الدولية
جلسات أخرى تابعة للجنة الإغاثة الدولية
الإحالات عن طريق عملاء آخرين تم خدمتهم
كيف تم التواصل مع هذا الشخص؟

questions.label: Specify other.
If through another IRC program/session (eg. ERD program), what was it called?

translations.ara: خدمات تطوير المشاريع التابعة لبرنامج الدعم الاقتصادي
خدمات التوظيف التابعة لبرنامج الدعم الاقتصادي
التدريب على المهارات المهنية الأساسية التابع لبرنامج الدعم الاقتصادي
جلسة معلومات تابعة لبرنامج الدعم الاقتصادي

options.label: Monitoring, Evaluation, Accountability, and Learning (MEAL) program

translations.en: Monitoring, Evaluation, Accountability, and Learning (MEAL) program

translations.ara: إذا تم التواصل مع هذا الشخص من خلال برنامج /دورة أخرى تابعة لبرنامج الإغاثة الدولية (على سبيل المثال ، برنامج الدعم الإقتصادي)، فما اسم هذا البرنامج أو الدورة؟
translations.en: If through another IRC program/session (eg. ERD program), what was it called?

questions.label: If through another organizational partner, what was it called?

translations.ara: إذا كان من خلال شريك تنظيمي آخر، فما اسم هذا الشريك التنظيمي؟
translations.en: If through another organizational partner, what was it called?

questions.label: This employment research will require regular follow-up with you for a period of about 12 months. Myself or a member of my team will follow up with you. Do you agree to be part of this?

translations.ara: سوف يتطلب هذا البحث التوظيفي متابعة منتظمة معك لمدة 12 شهر تقريباً. سأتابع معك أنا أو أحد أعضاء فريقي. هل توافق أن تكون جزءًا من هذا البحث؟
translations.en: This employment research will require regular follow-up with you for a period of about 12 months. Myself or a member of my team will follow up with you. Do you agree to be part of this?

questions.label: Interview date
Start time
Introduction

Instructions for ESO: This section will introduce the project and also determine whether or not a respondent is eligible to complete the intake form. Before you beging, please read the introduction message from the paper.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سيقدم ويحدد هذا القسم من المشروع ما إذا كان المشترك مؤهلاً لإكمال نموذج الاستبيان أم لا.قبل أن تبداء، يرجى قرائة المقدمة الورقية.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section will introduce the project and also determine whether or not a respondent is eligible to complete the intake form. Before you beging, please read the introduction message from the paper.

questions.label: This employment research will require regular follow-up with you for a period of about 12 months. Myself or a member of my team will follow up with you. Do you agree to be part of this? *

translations.ara: سوف يتطلب هذا البحث التوظيفي متابعة منتظمة معك لمدة 12 شهر تقريباً. سأتابعك أنا أو أحد أعضاء فريقي. هل توافق على أن تكون جزءًا من هذا البحث؟ *
translations.en: This employment research will require regular follow-up with you for a period of about 12 months. Myself or a member of my team will follow up with you. Do you agree to be part of this? *

questions.label: Instructions for ESO: Please close the form now!

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى إغلاق النموذج.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Please close the form now!

questions.label: Would you be interested in taking up a formal wage-paying job in the next month, if a suitable job could be found for you? (Note: This can be any job that pays a wage; even if it is informal) *

translations.ara: هل ترغب في الحصول على وظيفة رسمية براتب خلال الشهر القادم، إذا تم إيجاد وظيفة مناسبة لك؟ (ملاحظة: يمكن أن تكون أي وظيفة بأجرًا ؛ حتى وإن كانت وظيفة غير رسمية) *
translations.en: Would you be interested in taking up a formal wage-paying job in the next month, if a suitable job could be found for you? (Note: This can be any job that pays a wage; even if it is informal) *

questions.label: Instructions for ESO: Before closing this form now, ask the participant if anyone else in his/her family is interested in finding a formal wage job and when that family member is available to speak.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: قبل إغلاق هذا النموذج الآن ، اسأل المشارك إذا كان أي شخص آخر في عائلته يريد البحث على وظيفة رسمية و عن الوقت المناسب للتحدث مع هذا الشخص.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Before closing this form now, ask the participant if anyone else in his/her family is interested in finding a formal wage job and when that family member is available to speak.

questions.label: Is anyone else in your household likely to be interested in taking up a job that pays any kind of wage or salary in the next month, if a suitable job could be found?

translations.ara: أهناك شخص آخر في منزلك يريد بلحصول على وظيفة تدفع له أي نوع من الأجور أو الرواتب في الشهر القادم، إذا تم العثور على وظيفة مناسبة؟
translations.en: Is anyone else in your household likely to be interested in taking up a job that pays any kind of wage or salary in the next month, if a suitable job could be found?

questions.label: Is that person available to speak now?

translations.ara: هل هذا الشخص متواجد للتحدث معه الآن؟
translations.en: Is that person available to speak now?

questions.label: What day and time do you think they would be available?

translations.ara: ما هو اليوم والوقت المناسب الذي تعتقد أنه سيكون متواجد فيه؟
translations.en: What day and time do you think they would be available?

questions.label: Nationality: Which of the following best describes you?*

options.label: Non-Syrian or non-Jordanian who is eligible for work permit (eg. person with a Jordanian mother)

translations.ara: غير سوري أو غير أردني مؤهل للحصول على تصريح عمل (على سبيل المثال أبناء الأردنيات)
translations.en: Non-Syrian or non-Jordanian who is eligible for work permit (eg. person with a Jordanian mother)

translations.ara: الجنسية: أي من التالي يصفك بشكل أفضل؟ *
translations.en: Nationality: Which of the following best describes you?*

questions.label: National ID (if Jordanian)
MOI ID (if Syrian)
Jobseeker Profile

Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you would like to get their contact information to follow up with them on any job matches that have been made and to assist them where needed. Also inform them that Inform them that this section will ask general background questions.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك بأنك ترغب في الحصول على معلومات الاتصال الخاصة به لمتابعته في أي مطابقة عمل يتم إجراؤها ولمساعدته عند الحاجة.  يرجى أيضا ابلاغ المشترك أن هذا القسم سوف يتضمن أسئلة أساسية عامة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you would like to get their contact information to follow up with them on any job matches that have been made and to assist them where needed. Also inform them that Inform them that this section will ask general background questions.

questions.label: First name
Last name
Mobile number
E-mail address
Secondary contact name
Secondary contact relationship
Secondary contact mobile number
Best time to visit or call

translations.en: Best time to visit or call

questions.label: Gender
Date of birth
Job Preferences
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that this section is particularly important. It will allow us to capture all of the respondent's work preferences to try and find the best match for them.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك أن هذا القسم مهم جداً. سيتيح لنا معرفة جميع تفضيلات العمل الخاصة بالمشترك في محاولة العثور على أفضل وظيفة تطابق له.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that this section is particularly important. It will allow us to capture all of the respondent's work preferences to try and find the best match for them.

questions.label: What kind of job are you looking for? List a maximum of 2 in order of preference.

translations.ara: ما نوع العمل الذي تبحث عنه؟ اذكر 2 كحد أقصى بترتيب التفضيل.
translations.en: What kind of job are you looking for? List a maximum of 2 in order of preference.

questions.label: First preference *

translations.ara: مشرف على عمال الإنتاج - شركة صناعة
عمال تحميل و تنزيل - شركة صناعة
سائق أو ناقل مواد - شركة صناعة

options.label: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

translations.ara: عامل تحضير و تقديم الطعام (على سبيل المثال مطعم)
translations.en: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

questions.label: Second preference *

translations.ara: مشرف على عمال الإنتاج - شركة صناعة
عمال تحميل و تنزيل - شركة صناعة
سائق أو ناقل مواد - شركة صناعة

options.label: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

translations.ara: عامل تحضير و تقديم الطعام (على سبيل المثال مطعم)
translations.en: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

questions.label: Would you accept a job that was located in the Special Economic Zones (SEZs) such as Al-Hassan Industrial Estate?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تقع في منطقة اقتصادية خاصة مثل منطقة الحسن الصناعية؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that was located in the Special Economic Zones (SEZs) such as Al-Hassan Industrial Estate?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that requires physical labor (like moving boxes)?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تتطلب عمل جسدية (مثل تحريك الصناديق)؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that requires physical labor (like moving boxes)?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that required night shifts?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تتطلب مناوبات ليلية؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that required night shifts?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that required you to reside in a factory overnight?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تتطلب السكن في سكن للمصنع؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that required you to reside in a factory overnight?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that required you to attend an unpaid training session prior to starting work?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تطلبت حضور تدريب غير مدفوع قبل بدء العمل؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that required you to attend an unpaid training session prior to starting work?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that required you to work with coworkers or managers from the opposite gender?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تتطلب العمل مع زملاء أو مدراء من الجنس الاخر؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that required you to work with coworkers or managers from the opposite gender?

questions.label: Would your father, brother, or husband not allow you to take a job with male managers or coworkers?

options.label: They would not allow me to work with males

translations.ara: يمكنهم أن يمنعوني من العمل مع الذكور
translations.en: They would not allow me to work with males

options.label: They would allow me to work with males

translations.en: They would allow me to work with males

translations.ara: هل ممكن أن يمنعك الوالد أو الزوج أو أخوانك من العمل مع مدير أو زملاء ذكور؟
translations.en: Would your father, brother, or husband not allow you to take a job with male managers or coworkers?

questions.label: Would you accept a job that required you to work with non-Arab coworkers (for example, Bangladeshi, Indian, or Sri Lankan) who cannot speak Arabic?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بوظيفة تتطلب العمل مع زملاء غير عرب (مثلا من البنقلاديش أو من الهند أو من سريلانكا) و غير قادرين على التحدث بالعربي؟
translations.en: Would you accept a job that required you to work with non-Arab coworkers (for example, Bangladeshi, Indian, or Sri Lankan) who cannot speak Arabic?

questions.label: How far would you be willing to travel the job (in minutes)? *

translations.ara: كم من الوقت ستكون مستعد أن تقضيه في الطريق من المنزل للعمل (بالدقائق)؟ *
translations.en: How far would you be willing to travel the job (in minutes)? *

questions.label: How many days per week are you willing to work?

translations.ara: كم يوماً في الأسبوع لديك الأستعداد أن تقضي بالعمل؟
translations.en: How many days per week are you willing to work?

questions.label: How many hours per day are you willing to work?

translations.ara: كم ساعة في اليوم لديك الاستعداد أن تقضي في العمل؟
translations.en: How many hours per day are you willing to work?

questions.label: Do you have any health conditions or impairements that would not allow you to perform certain jobs?

translations.ara: هل لديك أي حالات صحية أو اعاقات تمنع من أداء وظائف معينة؟
translations.en: Do you have any health conditions or impairements that would not allow you to perform certain jobs?

questions.label: Specify other.
Are you a smoker?
Which of the following services would you find most helpful in order to take a job? List a maximum of 2 in order of importance.

translations.ara: أي من الخدمات التالية قد تجدها أكثر فائدة للقبول بوظيفة معينة؟ اذكر 2 بحد أقصى حسب الأهمية.
translations.en: Which of the following services would you find most helpful in order to take a job? List a maximum of 2 in order of importance.

questions.label: First preference
Specify other.
Second preference
Specify other.
What is the earliest time that you can start working?

translations.ara: ما هو أقرب وقت يمكنك فيه بدء العمل؟
translations.en: What is the earliest time that you can start working?

questions.label: Reservation Wage
ESO script: I will now ask you about your wage preferences. Your responses to these questions will not be passed on to potential employers without your consent.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن عن تفضيلات الراتب الخاصة بك. لن يتم إرسال إجاباتك على هذه الأسئلة إلى أصحاب العمل المحتملين دون موافقتك.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask you about your wage preferences. Your responses to these questions will not be passed on to potential employers without your consent.

questions.label: For someone with your work experience, education, and skills, what do you think is the average monthly wage to be paid for the top prefered job you indicated earlier? (in JOD)

translations.ara: بالنسبة إلى شخص لديه خبرتك في العمل، وعلمك، ومهاراتك، ما هو في اعتقادك متوسط الراتب الشهري الذي سيتم دفعه مقابل الوظيفة المفضلة التي أشرت إليها من قبل؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: For someone with your work experience, education, and skills, what do you think is the average monthly wage to be paid for the top prefered job you indicated earlier? (in JOD)

questions.label: Would you accept this job at the wage of ____ JOD per month?

translations.ara: هل تقبل هذه الوظيفة براتب ____ دينار في الشهر؟
translations.en: Would you accept this job at the wage of ____ JOD per month?

questions.label: Would you accept the job at the following monthly wage rates?

translations.ara: هل تقبل بالوظيفة بمعدلات الرواتب الشهرية التالية؟
translations.en: Would you accept the job at the following monthly wage rates?

questions.label: ____ JOD
____ JOD
____ JOD
____ JOD
____ JOD
____ JOD
Education and Skills
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondents that this section will focus on their previous education and skills.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشتركين أن هذا القسم سيركز على تعليمهم السابق ومهاراتهم.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondents that this section will focus on their previous education and skills.

questions.label: How many years of education have you completed?

translations.ara: كم عدد سنوات التعليم التي أكملتها؟
translations.en: How many years of education have you completed?

questions.label: What is the highest level of education that you have achieved?

translations.ara: ما هو أعلى مستوى تعليمي حصلت عليه؟
translations.en: What is the highest level of education that you have achieved?

questions.label: Specify other.
If you have a vocational training degree, Diploma, Bachelor's degree, Master's degree,or PhD what is your field of specialization?

translations.ara: إذا كنت حاصلاً على درجة تدريب مهني، أو دبلوم، أو درجة البكالوريوس، أو درجة الماجستير، أو درجة الدكتوراه، فما هو مجال تخصصك؟
translations.en: If you have a vocational training degree, Diploma, Bachelor's degree, Master's degree,or PhD what is your field of specialization?

questions.label: Specify other.
Which country is this degree from?

translations.ara: من أي دولة حصلت على درجتك العلمية؟
translations.en: Which country is this degree from?

questions.label: Did you complete your studies and graduate?

translations.en: Did you complete your studies and graduate?

questions.label: When did you graduate?
Have you completed any training or courses in the past 3 years?

translations.ara: هل أكملت أي دورات تدريبية في السنوات الثلاث الماضية؟
translations.en: Have you completed any training or courses in the past 3 years?

questions.label: What were the trainings/courses on?

translations.ara: عن ماذا كانت هذه الدورات التدريبية؟

questions.label: Specify other.
Are you able to read and write?

translations.ara: هل أنت قادر على القراءة والكتابة؟
translations.en: Are you able to read and write?

questions.label: How would you rate your English proficiency?

options.label: Not able to read, write, or speak in English

translations.ara: غير قادر على القراءة أو الكتابة أو التحدث باللغة الإنجليزية
translations.en: Not able to read, write, or speak in English

options.label: Able to speak a few phrases in English

translations.ara: القدرة على التحدث بعدة جمل باللغة الإنجليزية
translations.en: Able to speak a few phrases in English

options.label: Able to read and write simple phrases and sentences

translations.ara: القدرة على قراءة وكتابة خطاب أو بريد إلكتروني
translations.en: Able to read and write simple phrases and sentences

options.label: Able to have extended conversations with other people

translations.ara: قادر على إجراء محادثات طويلة مع أشخاص آخرين
translations.en: Able to have extended conversations with other people

options.label: Able to read and write a long document/report

translations.ara: القدرة على قراءة وكتابة وثيقة / تقرير طويل
translations.en: Able to read and write a long document/report
How would you rate your English proficiency?

questions.label: Describe your experience using computers/IT.

options.label: Basic skills (start, open file, turn off)

translations.en: Basic skills (start, open file, turn off)

options.label: Basic Word and Excel processing skills

translations.ara: مهارات أساسية في برنامجي وورد وإكسل
translations.en: Basic Word and Excel processing skills

options.label: Able to use specialized software porgrams like PeachTree or SPSS

translations.ara: القدرة على استخدام برمجيات متخصصة مثل برامج  بيتش تري أو SPSS
translations.en: Able to use specialized software porgrams like PeachTree or SPSS

options.label: Able to use programming languages such as Visual Basic, Java, or C++]

translations.ara: القدرة على استخدام لغات البرمجة مثل Visual Basic أو Java أو C ++
translations.en: Able to use programming languages such as Visual Basic, Java, or C++]

translations.ara: أوصف تجربتك باستخدام أجهزة الكمبيوتر/تكنولوجيا المعلومات.

questions.label: Do you have a driving license in Jordan?

translations.ara: هل لديك رخصة قيادة في الأردن؟
translations.en: Do you have a driving license in Jordan?

questions.label: Job Search
Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

translations.ara: إرشادات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذه الأسئلة تدور حول أحدث طريقة اتخذها المشترك للبحث عن وظيفة براتب أو أجر.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

questions.label: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: هل بحثت بنشاط عن وظيفة خلال ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

translations.ara: كم ساعة قضيت فيها بالبحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية؟
translations.en: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

questions.label: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو المبلغ الذي أنفقته في البحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية (بما في ذلك جميع النفقات، المواصلات، والطباعة، وشراء الصحف، وما إلى ذلك)، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

questions.label: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة
ما طريقة (طرق) البحث عن وظيفة التي استخدمتها في ال 30 يوماً الماضية؟
translations.en: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Specify other.
How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد طلبات العمل التي قمت بالتقديم لها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد مقابلات العمل التي قبت بها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد عروض العمل التي حصلت عليها خلال الـ 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Have you ever rejected a job that was offered to you?

translations.ara: هل سبق لك أن رفضت وظيفة عرضت عليك؟
translations.en: Have you ever rejected a job that was offered to you?

questions.label: What is the most common/likely reason that you rejected the offer?

options.label: I was sick when offered the job

translations.ara: كنت مريض عندما عرضت علي الوظيفة
translations.en: I was sick when offered the job

options.label: Family/societal norms wouldn't allow me to take the job

translations.ara: المعايير (التقاليد) العائلية / الاجتماعية لم تسمح لي بأخذ الوظيفة
translations.en: Family/societal norms wouldn't allow me to take the job

translations.ara: ما السبب الأكثر شيوعًا/احتمالًا لرفضك عرض العمل؟
translations.en: What is the most common/likely reason that you rejected the offer?

questions.label: Specify other.
Do you have a job that pays any kind of wage or salary (i.e. one in which you work for someone else and recieve some kind of payment)? *

translations.ara: هل لديك وظيفة تدفع لك أي نوع من الأجور أو الرواتب (أي وظيفة تعمل فيها لشخص آخر وتتلقى أجور نقدية من نوع ما)؟ *
translations.en: Do you have a job that pays any kind of wage or salary (i.e. one in which you work for someone else and recieve some kind of payment)? *

questions.label: How long, in months, have you been without any kind of work?

translations.ara: كم من الزمن، بالأشهر، كنت عاطلاً عن أي نوع من العمل؟
translations.en: How long, in months, have you been without any kind of work?

questions.label: How many jobs that pay you a wage or salary do you have?

translations.ara: كم عدد وظائفك الذي تدفع لك أي نوع من الأجور أو الرواتب؟
translations.en: How many jobs that pay you a wage or salary do you have?

questions.label: Current Job

ESO script: For the following questions, I would like you to consider your MAIN wage job (the job which took up the most time in the last 7 days. But if the respondants has not workered in the last seven days, consider the jobs which took up most of the time in the 7 days when he was last working)

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: بالنسبة للأسئلة التالية ، أود منك أن تفكر في الوظيفة الرئيسية التي تعتمد عليها للحصول على راتب (الوظيفة التي استغرقت معظم وقتك خلال الأيام السبعة الماضية. إن كان المشترك عاطل عن العمل خلال الأيام السبعة الماضية، ضع في عين الاعتبار اكثر الوظائف الذي قضى فيها معظم الوقت خلال ال7 أيام عندما كان يعمل)
translations.en: ESO script: For the following questions, I would like you to consider your MAIN wage job (the job which took up the most time in the last 7 days. But if the respondants has not workered in the last seven days, consider the jobs which took up most of the time in the 7 days when he was last working)

questions.label: How did you hear about this job?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة

translations.en: How did you hear about this job?

translations.ara: إذا كان من خلال الأصدقاء، فهؤلاء الأشخاص هم:
translations.en: If through friends, these people are:

questions.label: How was the hiring process?

options.label: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: تقديم السيرة الذاتية ومن ثم المقابلة بعد الإحالة للعمل عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل في موقع العمل بعد الاستعلام عنّي
translations.en: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

options.label: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي إلى الوظيفة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Social contact gave me the job directly

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي العمل مباشرة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (حصلت على العمل عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Social contact gave me the job directly

options.label: Given the job directly at the work site

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي الوظيفة في موقع العمل مباشرة
translations.en: Given the job directly at the work site

options.label: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

translations.ara: عقد اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي للعمل من قبل مدرستي جامعتي / كليتي)
translations.en: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

translations.en: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

options.label: Employer doesn't want to provide one

translations.ara: صاحب العمل لا يريد أن يوفر واحدة

options.label: It would subject me to exploitation from employers

translations.ara: سوف يخضعني لاستغلال من قبل أرباب العمل
translations.en: It would subject me to exploitation from employers

translations.ara: لم أسمع عن إمكانية الحصول على تصريح

translations.ara: ما هي أكبر العقبات للحصول على تصريح عمل؟

Besides your current job (if you have one), have you ever been employed in a wage job?

questions.label: Previous Job
Instructions for ESO: This section will ask the respondent questions about previous jobs that paid any kind of wage or salary (not current).

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سيطرح هذا القسم أسئلة للمشترك حول الوظائف السابقة الذي دفعت لك أي نوع من الأجور أو الرواتب؟ (غير الحالية).
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section will ask the respondent questions about previous jobs that paid any kind of wage or salary (not current).

questions.label: Current Business

ESO script: For the following questions, I would like you to consider your MAIN regular business (the business which took up the most time in the last 7 days. But if the respondent has not worked in the last seven days, consider the business which took up most of the time in the 7 days when he was last working)

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: بالنسبة للأسئلة التالية، أود منك أن تفكر في عملك (أو شركتك) الخاص الرئيسي (الذي استغرق اغلب وقتك خلال الأيام ال 7 الماضية، ولكن إذا كان المشترك عاطل عن العمل خلال الأيام السبعة الماضية، قم بسؤاله عن عمله الخاص الذي استغرق أغلب وقته خلال أخر سبعة أيام عندما كان يعمل)
translations.en: ESO script: For the following questions, I would like you to consider your MAIN regular business (the business which took up the most time in the last 7 days. But if the respondent has not worked in the last seven days, consider the business which took up most of the time in the 7 days when he was last working)

questions.label: When did you start this business or private work?

translations.ara: متى بدأت شركتك أو عملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: When did you start this business or private work?

questions.label: In what sector is this business or private work?

translations.ara: في أي قطاع صناعي تقع شركتك أوعملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: In what sector is this business or private work?

questions.label: Is this business or private work legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

translations.ara: هل هذا العمل الخاص مسجل رسميا و قانونيا (هل هي مسجلة لضرائب القيمة المضافة (VAT))؟
translations.en: Is this business or private work legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

questions.label: How are you paid in this business?

options.label: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

translations.ara: أدفع لنفسى راتب شهري ثابت من الأرباح الشهرية.
translations.en: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

options.label: I receive money from my customers.

translations.en: I receive money from my customers.

options.label: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.en: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.ara: كيف تستلم أجورك من هذا العمل؟
translations.en: How are you paid in this business?

questions.label: What was this amount last month?

translations.ara: كم كان هذا المبلغ الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: What was this amount last month?

questions.label: For the previous month...
Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

translations.ara: بالنظر إلى تكاليف راتبك و أية تكاليف أخرى، ما هو إجمالي نفقات عملك في الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

questions.label: What were the total sales of your business in the last month? Include sales of services.

translations.ara: ما هو إجمالي المبيعات لشركتك في الشهر الماضي؟ تشمل مبيعات الخدمات.
translations.en: What were the total sales of your business in the last month? Include sales of services.

questions.label: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits) last month?

translations.ara: بعد دفع جميع النفقات، ما هو دخل الشركة (الأرباح) في الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits) last month?

questions.label: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

translations.ara: كم عدد الشركات الذي تعمل بفس نطاق عملك و الذي تقع في منطقتكم (على بعد خمس دقائق سيراً على الأقدام)؟
translations.en: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

questions.label: Where is your most important competitor located?

options.label: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، ولكن في نفس الحي
translations.en: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

options.label: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، في حي مختلف ولكن في نفس المدينة
translations.en: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city
Where is your most important competitor located?

questions.label: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

translations.ara: باستثنائك، كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين في شركتك؟
translations.en: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك بشراء البضائع (مثل عناصر الإنتاج، الأثاث، المعدات) مباشرة من دولة أخرى بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك ببيع السلع أو الخدمات لمواطني الدول الأجنبية (على سبيل المثال عن طريق تصدير المنتجات، أو عن طريق البيع للسياح/المغتربين في الأردن) بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

questions.label: Besides your current business (if you have one), did you ever have your own business or private freelance project (even if it's small)?

translations.ara: بالاضافة الى شركتك أو عملك الخاص الحالي (إذا تملك واحد) ، هل سبق أن امتلكت شركة أو عمل خاص (حتى لو كان صغيرًا)؟
translations.en: Besides your current business (if you have one), did you ever have your own business or private freelance project (even if it's small)?

questions.label: Previous Business

Instructions for ESO: This section is only to be completed if respondent has previously owned a business in Jordan or Syria or any other country. These are businesses that have now closed; this is NOT the current business.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يتم إكمال هذا القسم فقط إذا كان المشترك قد سبق له امتلاك عمل خاص أو شركة في الأردن أو سوريا أو أي دولة أخرى. هذا يتعلق بعملك الخاص الذي أغلق الآن. هذا القسم لا يتعلق بالعمل الحالي.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section is only to be completed if respondent has previously owned a business in Jordan or Syria or any other country. These are businesses that have now closed; this is NOT the current business.

questions.label: How many businesses or private project have you owned before?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأعمال الخاصة أو الشركات التي ملكتها من قبل؟
translations.en: How many businesses or private project have you owned before?

questions.label: ESO script: If you have owned more than one business or private project before, I will now ask about the business that you ran for the longest time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: إذا كنت امتلكت أكثر من عمل خاص واحد من قبل، فسوف أسألك الآن عن العمل الخاص أو الشركة الذي قمت بتشغيلها لأطول وقت.
translations.en: ESO script: If you have owned more than one business or private project before, I will now ask about the business that you ran for the longest time.

questions.label: What country was this business or private work located in?

translations.ara: في أي بلد كانت تقع هذه الشركة؟
translations.en: What country was this business or private work located in?

questions.label: Specify other.
What city was the business or private project located in?

translations.ara: في أي مدينة كانت تقع هذه الشركة؟
translations.en: What city was the business or private project located in?

questions.label: What sector was this business or private project in?

translations.ara: بأي قطاع تجاري كان هذا العمل؟
translations.en: What sector was this business or private project in?

questions.label: What was the average monthly profit for this business or project project throughout its operation?

translations.ara: كم كان متوسط ​​الربح الشهري لهذا العمل طوال فترة تشغيله؟
translations.en: What was the average monthly profit for this business or project project throughout its operation?

questions.label: Please select the currency
After how many months did the business or private project start becoming profitable?

translations.ara: بعد كم من الأشهر بدأ العمل بجني الأرباح لك؟
translations.en: After how many months did the business or private project start becoming profitable?

questions.label: What was the average number of employees for this business or private project  throughout its operation?

translations.ara: كم كان متوسط ​​عدد الموظفين لهذه الشركة خلال عملها؟
translations.en: What was the average number of employees for this business or private project  throughout its operation?

questions.label: On average, how many hours per week did you spend working on this business or private project?

translations.ara: في المتوسط ​​، كم ساعة أسبوعياً كنت تقضي في العمل؟
translations.en: On average, how many hours per week did you spend working on this business or private project?

questions.label: Why did you stop running this business or private project?

options.label: Someone stole some or all of the business assets

translations.ara: سرق شخص بعض أو كل ممتلكات (أصول) العمل
translations.en: Someone stole some or all of the business assets

options.label: Some or all of the business assets were destroyed (eg. due to war or natural disaster)

translations.ara: لقد دمرت بعض أو كل ممتلكات (أصول) العمل (بسبب حرب أو كارثة طبيعية)
translations.en: Some or all of the business assets were destroyed (eg. due to war or natural disaster)

options.label: I decided to leave the country

translations.en: I decided to leave the country

translations.ara: لماذا توقفت عن تشغيل هذا العمل؟
translations.en: Why did you stop running this business or private project?

questions.label: Specify other.
How did you liquidate/ close/ exit the business or private project?

options.label: Sold the assets and kept the cash

translations.en: Sold the assets and kept the cash

options.label: Sold the whole business to someone for a price

translations.ara: قمت ببيع  العمل الخاص بالكامل لشخص ما مقابل سعر معين
translations.en: Sold the whole business to someone for a price

options.label: Gave the whole business to someone

translations.ara: أعطيت العل الخاص كله لشخص ما
translations.en: Gave the whole business to someone

options.label: The business had been destroyed (eg. due to war or natural disaster)

translations.ara: تم تدمير العمل الخاص بي (بسبب حرب أو كارثة طبيعية)
translations.en: The business had been destroyed (eg. due to war or natural disaster)

translations.ara: كيف قمت بتصفية / إغلاق / إنهاء العمل؟
translations.en: How did you liquidate/ close/ exit the business or private project?

questions.label: Specify other.
Household Profile
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that this section will ask general background questions.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك أن هذا القسم سوف يتضمن أسئلة أساسية عامة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that this section will ask general background questions.

questions.label: What is your marital status?
How many children do you have?

translations.en: How many children do you have?

questions.label: How many of your children are 4 years or under?

translations.ara: كم عدد أطفالك الذين هم بعمر 4 سنوات أو أقل؟
translations.en: How many of your children are 4 years or under?

questions.label: How many of your children are 6 years or under (including the kids under 4)?

translations.ara: كم عدد أطفالك الذين هم بعمر 6 سنوات أو أقل (بما في ذلك الأطفال الأصغر من سن الرابعة) ؟
translations.en: How many of your children are 6 years or under (including the kids under 4)?

questions.label: How many hours did you spend caring for children, old, sick or disabled people in the last 7 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد الساعات التي قضيتها في الاهتمام بالأطفال، كبار السن، المرضى أو ذوي الإعاقة خلال ال 7 أيام الماضية؟
translations.en: How many hours did you spend caring for children, old, sick or disabled people in the last 7 days?

questions.label: Who is the head of the household in which you currently live?

translations.ara: من هو رب الأسرة الذي تعيش معه حاليا؟
translations.en: Who is the head of the household in which you currently live?

questions.label: How many people currently live in your household (excluding you)?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأشخاص الذين يعيشون حاليًا في منزلك (باستثنائك)؟
translations.en: How many people currently live in your household (excluding you)?

questions.label: Household Expenditure Patterns
Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money on a monthly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: اسأل المشتركين حول كيفية إنفاق أموالهم على أساس شهري. يمكن للمشتركين تقدير الإنفاق هنا.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money on a monthly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

questions.label: How much does your household usually pay on the following per MONTH either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

translations.ara: كم تدفع أسرتك بالعادة على ما يلي في الشهر إما لك أو لعائلتك أو للآخرين؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: How much does your household usually pay on the following per MONTH either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

questions.label: Food and drink
Rent/housing
Electricity/gas
Water
Healthcare
Education (school fees and materials only, not including transportation)

translations.ara: التعليم (الرسوم المدرسية والمواد فقط ، وليس بما في ذلك المواصلات)
translations.en: Education (school fees and materials only, not including transportation)

questions.label: Transportation
Communication (eg. mobile phone credit/internet)

translations.ara: الاتصال (على سبيل المثال ، رصيد الهاتف المحمول / الإنترنت)

questions.label: Debt repayment
Cigarettes, shisha/argeela
Household goods (soap, cleaning, etc)
Spending on other things
Household Income Sources
ESO script: I will now ask you a set of questions on your income sources. This information will not be shared with potential employers or other organizations.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن مجموعة من الأسئلة حول مصادر دخلك. لن يتم مشاركة هذه المعلومات مع أصحاب العمل المحتملين أو المنظمات الأخرى.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask you a set of questions on your income sources. This information will not be shared with potential employers or other organizations.

questions.label: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​الدخل الشهري لأسرتك، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

questions.label: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD? (not the total household income)

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​دخلك الشهري، بالدينار الأردني؟ (وليس مجموع دخل الأسرة)
translations.en: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD? (not the total household income)

questions.label: In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

translations.ara: المساعدات المالية عن طريق المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمات الدولية

options.label: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: التحويلات من ألأسرة أو ألأصحاب خارج البلد
translations.en: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: في الأيام السبعة الماضية، ما كان مصدر الدخل الرئيسي للأموال التي أنفقتها؟
translations.en: In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

questions.label: Specify other.
How much does your household receive in direct financial assistance from humanitarian organizations per month, in JOD? (not including any support coupons)

translations.ara: كم تتلقى أسرتك من المساعدات المالية المباشرة من المنظمات الإنسانية شهرياً، بالدينار الأردني؟ (لا تشمل أي كوبونونات دعم)
translations.en: How much does your household receive in direct financial assistance from humanitarian organizations per month, in JOD? (not including any support coupons)

questions.label: Which of the following in-kind services does your household receieve from humanitarian organizations?

translations.ara: أي من الخدمات العينية التالية تحصل عليها أسرتك من المنظمات الإنسانية؟
translations.en: Which of the following in-kind services does your household receieve from humanitarian organizations?

questions.label: Specify other.
Now imagine that, instead of receiving these services for free, you had to purchase them. How much would it cost you to purchase the same services?

translations.ara: تخيل الآن أنه بدلاً من تلقي هذه الخدمات مجانًا، كان عليك أن تدفع لتحصل عليها. كم ستكون التكلفة لتلقي هذه الخدمات؟
translations.en: Now imagine that, instead of receiving these services for free, you had to purchase them. How much would it cost you to purchase the same services?

questions.label: Does your household receive money (remittances) from family or friends living outside of Jordan?

translations.ara: هل تتلقى أسرتك المال (تحويلات) من أفراد العائلة أو الأصدقاء الذين يعيشون في خارج الأردن؟
translations.en: Does your household receive money (remittances) from family or friends living outside of Jordan?

questions.label: How does your household receive the money?

options.label: Through a money exchange shop like Western Union

translations.ara: من خلال صرافة مالية مثلل الويسترن يونيون
translations.en: Through a money exchange shop like Western Union

options.label: Through an intermediary (someone who recieves the money in Jordan and sends it to us)

translations.ara: من خلال وسيط (شخص يستلم المال في الأردن ويرسله لنا)
translations.en: Through an intermediary (someone who recieves the money in Jordan and sends it to us)
How does your household receive the money?

questions.label: Specify other.
On average, how much does your household receive from these remittances, in JOD?

translations.ara: تقريبا كم المبلغ التي تتلقاه أسرتك كل شهر من هذه التحويلات ، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: On average, how much does your household receive from these remittances, in JOD?

questions.label: Have you ever borrowed money?

translations.ara: هل سبق لك أن اقترضت المال؟

questions.label: Where did you borrow the money from?

translations.en: Where did you borrow the money from?

questions.label: How much money do you still owe (in JOD)?

translations.ara: كم المبلغ الذي ما زلت مدينه (بالدينار الأردني)؟
translations.en: How much money do you still owe (in JOD)?

questions.label: Refugees
Instructions for ESO: This section is only for refugees.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا القسم هو فقط للاجئين.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section is only for refugees.

questions.label: What country did you live in prior to moving to Jordan?

translations.ara: ما اسم البلد الذي كنت تعيش فيه قبل الانتقال إلى الأردن؟
translations.en: What country did you live in prior to moving to Jordan?

questions.label: Please indicate the name of the city, town, or village.

translations.ara: يرجى توضيح اسم المدينة أو البلدة أو القرية.
translations.en: Please indicate the name of the city, town, or village.

questions.label: How large is this city/town?
How long have you been in Jordan?

translations.en: How long have you been in Jordan?

questions.label: Are you planning on seeking asylum in a country other than Jordan?

translations.ara: هل تخطط لطلب لجوء في بلد آخر غير الأردن؟
translations.en: Are you planning on seeking asylum in a country other than Jordan?

questions.label: How soon, in months, are you planning to leave Jordan, in months?

translations.en: How soon, in months, are you planning to leave Jordan, in months?

questions.label: ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى الإجابة على الأسئلة التالية بأوافق بشدة، أوافق بشكل عام، لا أوافق أو أعارض، أعارض بشكل عام، أعارض بشدة. إن كنت لا تتذكر هذه الخيارات، فيمكنني تكرارها لك في أي وقت.
translations.en: ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

questions.label: I feel connected to Jordan
I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: لدي نفس  الفرص لإيجاد عمل رسمي مثل جيراني الأردنيين
translations.en: I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

translations.ara: سأعامل نفس معاملت  زملائي الأردنيين في وظيفة مدفوعة الأجر
translations.en: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

questions.label: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، لدي المعرفة و الوالمهارات والمصادر التي أحتاجها للبحث عن عمل
translations.en: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

questions.label: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

translations.ara: غالبا ما أحضر اجتماعات مجتمعية أو رياضية أو أحداث أخرى مماثلة بوجود خليط من الأردنيين و اللاجئين
translations.en: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

questions.label: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: يسمح لي و لعائلتي الوصول الى خدمات الرعاية الصحية بنفس سهولة وصول جيراننا الأردنيين لها
translations.en: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، يمكنني الحصول على المساعدة بخصوص المشاكل القانونية
translations.en: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

questions.label: Positive Mood

ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: نود أن نطرح عليك أربعة أسئلة عن مشاعرك حول جوانب معينة في حياتك. لا توجد اجابات صحيحة أو خاطئة. لكل سؤال، أود منك تقديم اجابة على مقياس من 0 الي 10، حيث أن الرقم 0 يدل على اجابة "على الاطلاق" و 10 يدل على اجابة "كليا."
translations.en: ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

questions.label: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، ما مدى رضاك عن حياتك هذه الأيام؟
translations.en: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

questions.label: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، الأي مدى تشعر أن الأشياء التي تقوم بها في حياتك جديرة بالأهتمام؟
translations.en: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

questions.label: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: بشكل عام ما مدى شعورك بالسعادة بالأمس؟
translations.en: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: على مقياس من 0-10 حيث 0 "لست قلقاً على الاطلاق" و 10 قلق تمامًا"، بشكل عام، ما مدى قلقك بالأمس؟
translations.en: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: Exit and Follow-up
Instructions for ESO: This is the last section!

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا هو القسم الأخير!
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This is the last section!

questions.label: Please share any documentation (CV, certificates, etc) that might be helpful for this employment service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي وثائق (السيرة الذاتية والشهادات وغيرها) التي قد تكون مفيدة لخدمة التوظيف هذه.
translations.en: Please share any documentation (CV, certificates, etc) that might be helpful for this employment service.

questions.label: What is the best method to contact you?

translations.ara: ما هي أفضل طريقة للتواصل معك؟
translations.en: What is the best method to contact you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did you hear about this service before this survey?

translations.ara: هل سمعت عن هذه الخدمة قبل هذا الاستبيان؟
translations.en: Did you hear about this service before this survey?

questions.label: How did you hear about this service?

translations.en: How did you hear about this service?

questions.label: Specify other.
Who else would you reccommend for this service?

translations.ara: أهنالك شخص آخر تريد أن توصي به لهذه الخدمة؟
translations.en: Who else would you reccommend for this service?

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

Trainings and Courses
Answer the following for each training/course:

translations.ara: أجب على ما يلي لكل دورة تدريبية:
translations.en: Answer the following for each training/course:

questions.label: What was this training/course on?

translations.ara: عن ماذا كانت هذه الدورة التدريبية؟

questions.label: Specify other.
Who organized this training/course?

translations.ara: منظمة غير حكومية أو منظمة دولية

questions.label: Specify other.
In which country was this training/course held?

translations.ara: في أي دولة قدمت هذه الدورات؟
translations.en: In which country was this training/course held?

Risk and Time Preferences

I will now ask some questions about your attitude towards uncertainty. To do this, I will describe several hypothetical scenarios in which you need to make a choice about uncertain outcomes. There is no 'right' or 'wrong' answer to this question.

translations.ara: سأطرح الآن بعض الأسئلة حول ردود فعلك للمواقف الغير مؤكدة. للقيام بذلك، سأقوم بوصف عدد من السيناريوهات الافتراضية التي تحتاج منك أن تقوم باختيار نتيجة غير مؤكدة. لا يوجد إجابات "صحيحة" أو "خاطئة" على هذا السؤال.
translations.en: I will now ask some questions about your attitude towards uncertainty. To do this, I will describe several hypothetical scenarios in which you need to make a choice about uncertain outcomes. There is no 'right' or 'wrong' answer to this question.

questions.label:
Imagine this scenario: There are two possible bus routes that you can take to get to the center of the city, Route A or Route B. Route A takes 60 minutes to get you to the city center from your home. Route B can take either more or less than 60 minutes depending on traffic.You have no information on the level of traffic in this route.

For each of the next 5 questions, please select the route that you prefer.

translations.ara: تخيل هذا السيناريو: هنالك طريقين يمكن للحافلة أن تسلكها للوصول لمركز المدينة، طريق أ أو طريق ب. طريق أ يأخذ 60 دقيقة دائماً من منزلك لمركز المدينة. بينما، طريق ب يمكن أن يأخذ أكثر أو أقل من 60 دقيقة على حسب أزمة الطريق. ليس لديك أي معلومات عن مستوى الأزمة في هذا الطريق. لكل سؤال من الأسئلة الخمسة التالية ، يرجى تحديد الطريق المفضل لك.
translations.en:
Imagine this scenario: There are two possible bus routes that you can take to get to the center of the city, Route A or Route B. Route A takes 60 minutes to get you to the city center from your home. Route B can take either more or less than 60 minutes depending on traffic.You have no information on the level of traffic in this route.

For each of the next 5 questions, please select the route that you prefer.

questions.label: Disagreeing with an authority figure on a major issue.

translations.ara: اختلف مع شخصية لها سلطة حول قضية رئيسية.
translations.en: Disagreeing with an authority figure on a major issue.

questions.label: Searching for a job that you truly enjoy rather than taking a more secure job that is offered.

translations.ara: البحث عن وظيفة تستمتع بها بدلاً من القبول بوظيفة أكثر أمان تم عرضها عليك.
translations.en: Searching for a job that you truly enjoy rather than taking a more secure job that is offered.

questions.label: Starting a new business, even though that business may fail.

translations.ara: البدء بعمل جديد، على الرغم من أن هذا العمل قد يفشل.
translations.en: Starting a new business, even though that business may fail.
